sentences.english: Taking Zhouzhuang as a studying case, this paper discusses the tourism language in Zhouzhuang.
sentences.chinese: 本文对周庄旅游语言进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The decorated archway of village ZhouZhuang seems to stand at the entrance of the attraction as well as my mind.
sentences.chinese: 那周庄的牌楼似乎也很魁伟地立在入口处。

sentences.english: To the early years of Qing Emperor Kangxi officially named as Zhouzhuang Zhen.
sentences.chinese: 至清康熙初年正式定名为周庄镇。

sentences.english: Watching people flowing water bridge, Zhouzhuang is Hongcun flies.
sentences.chinese: 观小桥流水人家，过得周庄是宏村。
